scripts.gym: concurrently --names "BACKEND,MOBILE,STAFF" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix mobile" "npm run dev --prefix staff-web"
scripts.gym:api: concurrently --names "BACKEND,STAFF" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix staff-web"
